resources.string: Choose timetable from navigation drawer on left
Unable to find any timetables. Try to delete all in settings
Error occurred, please report on mail!
Failed to download, check internet connection
Without permissionss app is unable to store timetables

string.name: errorloadingimage
string.i: Unable to display timetable! Check app permissions.

resources.string: Unable to load news! Check your internet connection

For ease of viewing outside of city interactive map only shows end bus stations. Also most of suburban bus lines don't stop at the urban city bus stations so they're not shown on map as well. 

Since I cannot find anywhere exact bus routes and station locations there can be some wrong map data. If you notice any please report using 'Report wrong data' option below. 
Thank you for your understanding
This app needs the Location permission, please accept to use location functionality
If Split Bus doesn\'t work please check timetables on the official Promet Split website
Displays all bus routes and stops on the interactive Google Maps map inside the app. This part is still in works and it will be available in future releases
All parts of the city are connected by a dense network of bus lines
Except urban city bus lines at the service of passengers there\'s more than a 30 suburban bus lines
Bus traffic in the city of Split and the surrounding area has been divided into four tariff zones
Map displaying all public car parking sites
Map displaying locations of all public car garages
If enabled app will always download a new timetable from the internet. In case there\'s no internet access app will show last downloaded one
Delete all stored timetables and reset app settings
You\'re about to delete all stored timetables and reset app settings
URLs open inside app in custom chrome tabs
Display traffic info on interactive map
Show bus stops for selected route
Description, changes, bug reports and other app related information
Split Bus app displays all Promet Split bus timetables. All timetable pictures and city maps are property of Promet Split d.o.o.

Version 2.1.3 – 04.09.2017 
*Android O 8.0 support
*Fixed some timetables
NOTICE: Promet Split suddenly started to change timetable urls. In order to keep app updated I have to manually update them in app, so it might happen that app is unable to display latest timetable. I'm sorry for inconveniences that this might cause. If you notice anything feel free to report on mail. 

Version 2.1.2 – 18.08.2017 
*Fixed some timetables
NOTICE: Promet Split suddenly started to change timetable urls. In order to keep app updated I have to manually update them in app, so it might happen that app is unable to display latest timetable. I'm sorry for inconveniences that this might cause. If you notice anything feel free to report on mail.

 Version 2.1.1 – 06.07.2017 
*New app logo 
*Bugfixes 

 Version 2.1.0 – 23.05.2017 
*Added ability to download all timetables 
*Added ability to download ticket pricelist 
*Added new links for parkings and garages 
*Redesigned informations 
*Fixed line number 27 
*Ostali minor fixes 

 Version 2.0.0 – 31.08.2016 
*App redesigned, implemented navigation drawer 
*Added 'Recently used' timetables 
*Added ability to share timetable 
*Added public parking spots to Informations 
* Added traffic info to Interactive map 
*Added lines 73, 76, 77, 80, 81, 86 to Interactive map 
*New tablet layout 
*Support for Android M (permissions)
*Support for Android N (multi-window) 
*Other minor changes and bugfixes 

 Version 1.5.0 – 09.06.2015 
*Added new option in settings 'Always download' 
*Added section 'Informations' 
*Added lines 30, 36, 37, 60, 67, 68, 69, 71, 72 to interactive map 
*Added end stations on interactive map 
*Added new option for reporting wrong interactive map data 
*Improved tablet layout 
*Improved app design 
*Rewritten most of code so you can expect more minor changes
*Hopefully fixed crashes occurring on some devices (HTC Desire 200 and 610, Alcatel One Touch etc.)

 Version 1.4.3 – 17.02.2015 
*Added option to download all timetables in settings menu 
*Minor tweaks 

 Version 1.4.2 – 06.01.2015 
*Tweaked design (new icons) 
*Added lines 31, 32, 33, 39, 40, 37 to interactive map 
*Updates to interactive map 
*Bugfixes for some devices 

 Version 1.4.1 – 04.10.2014 
*New Material Design from Android 5.0 Lollipop 
*New bus line Širina - Bubići (if line dosent appear go to Settings -> Delete timetables) 
*Minor tweaks 

 Version 1.4.0 – 24.09.2014 
*New timetable app layout 
*Disabled tinted status bar for now (Android 4.4) 
*Split Bus now requires Android 4.0 
*Bugfixes

Fetching latest data, please hold on!

Recently Split Bus have stopped working because Promet Split released a new website. They've done it without any announcement and this caught me in surprise. In this short period I've developed a new app with a brand new timetable format based on their redesigned website. 

You'll notice some features are missing (interactive maps, information section, settings) but they should appear soon in following updates. 

If you encounter any major bugs please report them using button below 
Antonio

Version 2.3.0 – 22.07.2018 
* Implemented news section (Croatian only) 

 Version 2.2.2 – 29.05.2018 
* Bugfixes, hopefully fixed force closes on some devices, if they still occur please report them at email 
* Favourites will reset since I've changed db structure 

Version 2.2.1 – 22.05.2018 
* Favourites are back!
* Introduced Trogir and Šolta timetables
* Fixed crashes on older Android 4.4 devices 

 Version 2.2.0 – 17.05.2018 
* App now supports new Promet Split website
* Detailed description inside the app
